name: Nuclear Love
description:
Inspired by the Jam ending so close to Halloween.

After the bombs went off most people died, those that were left had a hard time. Not just because of the radiation and destruction of society as they new it. But because there were noticeably fewer fish in the sea.

Have fun getting to know other survivors in this dating-show, who knows, maybe you might find your future Mr. or Mrs Right?

Made by Jono Shields and James Ruxton using the amazing Butano engine.

NOTE: The jam version has a bug that only lets you choose two of the participants, please use the fix version.
